%U A035809 1341056098444288,10043368807877088,70018291338395136,456821317532555680
%N A035809 Coordination sequence for lattice D*_48 (with edges defined by l_1 norm = 1).
%C A035809 Starts to differ from A035743 at a(24). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 24 2008]
%D A035809 J. Serra-Sagrista, Enumeration of lattice points in l_1 norm, Information Processing Letters, 76, no. 1-2 (2000), 39-44.
%H A035809 <a href="/index/Rec#order_48">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (48, -1128, 17296, -194580, 1712304, -12271512, 73629072, -377348994, 1677106640, -6540715896, 22595200368, -69668534468, 192928249296, -482320623240, 1093260079344, -2254848913647, 4244421484512, -7309837001104, 11541847896480, -16735679449896, 22314239266528, -27385657281648, 30957699535776, -32247603683100, 30957699535776, -27385657281648, 22314239266528, -16735679449896, 11541847896480, -7309837001104, 4244421484512, -2254848913647, 1093260079344, -482320623240, 192928249296, -69668534468, 22595200368, -6540715896, 1677106640, -377348994, 73629072, -12271512, 1712304, -194580, 17296, -1128, 48, -1).
%F A035809 a(m)=add(2^k*binomial(n, k)*binomial(m-1, k-1), k=0..n)+2^n*binomial((n+2*m)/2-1, n-1); with n=48.
